top_banner.title: FESTIVAL PASSES 2024
top_banner.description: Passes are exclusively sold online, no passes will be available for sale at the entrance.
top_banner.description1: Passes to Tanweer Festival can be purchased for 1 day or 3 days.
top_banner.description2: All passes include full day access to the entire festival including concerts, well-being workshops and sessions, Transcendent Plaza, Marketplace, Food Courts and Art Installations.
top_banner.description3: Add a camping experience to any pass to experience the nature of the beautiful Mleiha desert while staying close to all the festivities.

festival_passes.title: REGULAR

festival_passes.description: 3 day access to all areas in the festival and General Admission of the Main Stage.

last_paragraph: Explore our Stay & Activities page to enrich your experience at the Tanweer Festival, ensuring every moment is infused with meaning and inspiration.
